ch.vocal.view

Class VocabularyOverviewController

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for the VocabularyOverview Window "Vokabeltrainer"
    Author:
    peter.bucher

    • Constructor Detail

      • VocabularyOverviewController

        public VocabularyOverviewController()
        The constructor. The constructor is called before the initialize() method.

        In this application it is empty.

    • Method Detail

      • setMainApp

        public void setMainApp(MainApp mainApp)
        Is called by an application to give a reference back to main.
        Parameters:
        mainApp - Object to reference to class MainApp

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Initializes the controller class. This method is automatically called after the fxml file has been loaded.

        Initialize the Overview table by calculate the values for show.

      • DefineLearn

        public void DefineLearn()
        Defining the Level for learning. It is called by Rootlayout, use the SetRadiobuttonMode Class. accessible and mark the words for learning.

        Make the Radiobuttons accessible and mark the words for learning, then deactivate the Radiobuttons again.

        Uses SetRadioButtonMode(boolean) for main work.

      • SetRadioButtonMode

        public void SetRadioButtonMode(boolean rbmode)
        Defining the Level for learning. It is called by DefineLearn.

        Make the Radiobuttons accessible and mark the words for learning, then deactivate the Radiobuttons again.

        Parameters:
        rbmode - Show Radiobuttons if true, otherwise hide them
        See Also:
        DefineLearn(), MainApp.CancelLearnMain()

      • SetLevelTextBold

        public void SetLevelTextBold(boolean ltmode)
        Set the learing Level Text to bold. It is called from Radiobuttons via corresponding RadioButton Listener DoLearnLevel(number).

        The learn level is taken from each learnword of the public Object vocabulary.

        Parameters:
        ltmode - if true, set learn level text bold, otherwise set all text to normal
        See Also:
        MainApp.CancelLearnMain(), DoLearnNewWord()
